text:
Take a look.
The costumes for the new song have arrived.

Ah, they fit perfectly with noctchill's image.
I'm looking forward to the performance from now on.

Practice shouldn't let Koito down.
So, Koito just needs to give it her all.
Yeah, I believe Koito can do it.

R-Right... You're right! Ehehe...
I'm looking forward to performing live with everyone...
